title: Definitions
context: PART IV. ASSISTING PROCESSING ENTERPRISES ยง39A-111 Definitions. Whenever used in this part, unless a different meaning clearly appears from the context: &ldquo;Department&rdquo; means the department of budget and finance. &ldquo;Project&rdquo; means any combination of land, buildings, and other improvements thereon, for use as a processing enterprise, including, without limiting the generality of the foregoing, machinery, equipment, furnishings, and apparatus which shall be deemed necessary, suitable, or useful to such enterprise. &ldquo;Project agreement&rdquo; means any agreement entered into under this part by the department with a project party to financially assist a processing enterprise from the proceeds of special purpose revenue bonds, including without limitation any loan agreement. &ldquo;Project party&rdquo; means a person, firm, or corporation qualified to do business in this State and conducting or proposing to conduct a processing enterprise in this State. &ldquo;Special purpose revenue bonds&rdquo; or &ldquo;bonds&rdquo; means bonds, notes, or other evidences of indebtedness of the State issued pursuant to this part. [L 1981, c 121, pt of ยง2] Revision Note Numeric designations deleted.
